weapons.name: Harpoon Gun
weapons.description: Pulls enemies to you and deals damage.

weapons.name: Predator's Cloaking Device
weapons.description: Become nearly invisible for a short time. Effect is removed by swapping weapons or when swimming.

weapons.name: Zapotron
weapons.description: Sniper Rifle: High Tech. Energy rifle that can be fired normally, or can be charged up to fire a single powerful shot that does extreme damage and can pierce through multiple enemies. Deals energy damage which is fairly effective against all elemental enemies.
weapons.search_tags: Guns Ranged Sniper Rifles EnergyCells SemiAuto

weapons.name: Zap Zapp
weapons.description: Pistol: High Tech. Fires balls of energy that deal damage to enemies in a small radius. Deals energy damage that is fairly effective against all types of elemental enemies.

weapons.name: Super Shredder
weapons.description: Sniper Rifle: Cluster. Hybrid shotgun-sniper that fires tight groupings of pellets that deal heavy damage. Has a large magazine size, and fair accuracy at long range.
weapons.search_tags: Guns Ranged Sniper Rifles Shells Slugs SemiAuto

weapons.name: Triple Tap
weapons.description: Sniper Rifle: Burst. Fires accurate three-round bursts, dealing very high damage, but consuming ammo quickly.
weapons.search_tags: Guns Ranged Sniper Rifles HeavyBullets SemiAuto

weapons.name: Monsoon
weapons.description: Pistol: Special. Absurdly fast-firing pistol with a large magazine that dishes out ridiculous damage at short to mid-range. Offset by poor accuracy, extreme ammo consumption, and a brief spin-up time before firing.

weapons.name: Explosive Batarang
weapons.description: Batman's Batarang. Homes in on players and sticks to walls. Explodes if it detects enemies in proximity.

weapons.name: Egg Launcher
weapons.description: Explosive Weapon: Lobs rockets that damage everything in an area.

weapons.name: Hand Cannon
weapons.description: Pistol: Semi-Automatic. Large-caliber sidearm with heavy damage, decent magazine size, and slow rate of fire.

weapons.name: Revolver
weapons.description: Pistol: Revolver. Fast, precise sidearm, with a good punch but small capacity.
